summary: The story of a minibus driver and a fairytale princesss nestling under the wing of timeless friendship in an ordinary neighborhood.
cast: Hande Dogandemir|Fatih Artman|Cengiz Bozkurt|Sadi Celil Cengiz|Gökçe Bahadir|Tarik Ünlüoglu|Gürkan Uygun|Seher Devrim Yakut|Erdal Tosun|Berat Yenilmez|Cihan Ercan|Burcu Biricik|Ercan Yazgan|Caglar Ertugrul|Andy Boyns|Alfred Hsing|Ali Dogan Erdogmus|Selim Akay|Stacy Baker|Yilmaz Erdogan|Ozan Gençel|Emine Gulsum Goznumer|Engin Günay|Ani Ipekkaya|Emrah Kaman|Sahin Kendirci|Asuman Kostak|Hakan Salinmis|Hilmi Özçelik
title: Bana Masal Anlatma
